suggest.amasty/custom-stock-status-msi: Install stockstatus-msi module to activate MSI and Custom Stock Status integration.
suggest.amasty/stockstatus-graphql: Install stockstatus-graphql module to activate GraphQl and Custom Stock Status integration.
suggest.amasty/module-stockstatus-mftf-2: Install stockstatus-mftf-2 module to be able to run Stockstatus MFTF tests for Magento 2.3.5+ version
suggest.amasty/module-stockstatus-mftf-3: Install stockstatus-mftf-3 module to be able to run Stockstatus MFTF tests for Magento 2.4.0+ version
